resources.string:
Welcome to DTCC 
 
 Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation 

 Securing Today Shaping Tomorrow 

 DTCC, established in 1973, was created to reduce costs 
 and provide clearing and settlement efficiencies by 
 immobilizing securities and making "book-entry" 
 changes to ownership of the securities. 
 DTC brings efficiency to the securities industry by 
 retaining custody of more than 1.3 million active 
 securities issues valued at US$54.2 trillion as of 
 7/31/2017, including securities issued in the US 
 and more than 131 countries and territories.
